meanings.definition: Opposing or designed to prevent fraud.
meanings.sent1: The company implemented strict antifraud measures to protect its customers.
meanings.sent2: She purchased an antifraud software to secure her online transactions.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's antifraud cape could detect any dishonest schemes.
meanings.sent4: His antifraud attitude towards financial scams saved many from being deceived.
meanings.sent5: The antifraud alarm system alerted authorities of any suspicious activities.

meanings.definition: A person or organization that works to prevent fraud.
meanings.sent1: The antifraud investigated the case thoroughly to catch the scammer.
meanings.sent2: She joined the antifraud team to help protect consumers from identity theft.
meanings.sent3: The antifraud at the bank was known for his sharp eye in spotting fake documents.
meanings.sent4: The antifraud organization collaborated with law enforcement to combat financial crimes.
meanings.sent5: As an antifraud, his mission was to ensure honesty and integrity in all transactions.
